articles.author: Šejla Ahmatović
articles.title: Robert Fico shooting: Slovak police charge 71-year-old poet over assassination attempt - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The suspect could face life in prison.
articles.content:
Slovakian police on Thursday charged Juraj Cintula, a 71-year-old former security guard, with attempted murder in the shooting of Prime Minister Robert Fico.
The suspect is accused of attacking Fico… [+383 chars]

articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: Who is Juraj Cintula, poet and writer who opened fire on Slovak PM Robert Fico - The Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: Slovak PM Robert Fico was stable after an assassination attempt by poet Juraj Cintula. The motive is still unclear. Interior Ministry spokesman Neuman
